Params: {1: '1', 3: 'You all dash into the bridge, only to find no enemy to fight.'}
{3: 'But the four of you seem to start losing your perception ability...'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Area scan... Argh! It's the interfering nodes! If we let them stay where they are, they're going to keep affecting our perception ability!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I've uploaded some possible locations to the command link!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "We have one immediately around us... That's why the disruption is so strong!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'So they installed this interfering node on the pre-existing program module...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'No. Aside from the interfering node, there is a data stream that goes beyond the program module... Can it be...', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Is the communication between Huaxu and the ground also integrated with this interference module? Such a high degree of aggregation is a reasonable guess considering that the intrusion took place so suddenly.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Which means if we destroy the interfering node, we'll also be able to sever Huaxu's connection with the ground server?", 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Correct, and when that happens, I imagine Huaxu's sub-terminals will be critically hurt.", 4: '2'}
